amendments.title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Food Products Standards and Food Additives) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.summary: Amendments to food products standards and food additives regulations
requirements: Food products shall comply with the standards specified in Appendix A
Food additives shall comply with the standards specified in Appendix B
Manufacturers shall ensure that food products are safe for human consumption
Manufacturers shall ensure that food products are labeled correctly
Manufacturers shall maintain records of food products
amendments.details: Manufacturers shall ensure compliance with the amended regulations, including maintaining records and labeling products correctly.

deadlines.raw: sixty days from the date of publication of this notification

amendments.title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Laboratory and Sample Analysis) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.summary: Amendments to laboratory and sample analysis regulations
requirements: Laboratories shall comply with the standards specified in Schedule I
Laboratories shall ensure that sample analysis is conducted correctly
Laboratories shall maintain records of sample analysis
Laboratories shall ensure that personnel are trained and competent
amendments.details: Laboratories shall ensure compliance with the amended regulations, including maintaining records and ensuring personnel competence.

deadlines.raw: sixty days from the date of publication of this notification

amendments.title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Vegan Foods) Amendment Regulations, 2025
requirements: Vegan foods shall comply with the standards specified in Schedule I
Vegan foods shall be labeled correctly
Manufacturers shall ensure that vegan foods are safe for human consumption
amendments.details: Manufacturers shall ensure compliance with the amended regulations, including labeling products correctly.

deadlines.raw: sixty days from the date of publication of this notification

amendments.title: Draft Notification of Food Safety and Standards
amendments.summary: The Food Safety and Standards Authority of India proposes to amend the Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Regulations, 2020.
requirements: amendments to the Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Regulations, 2020
changes to the labelling requirements for food products
inclusion of nutrition information on food labels
specifications for the display of food products
compliance with the Food Safety and Standards Act, 2006
adherence to the regulations by food business operators
provision of information to consumers about the food products
amendments.details: Food business operators are expected to comply with the amended regulations, which include providing nutrition information on food labels, following specific labelling requirements, and ensuring compliance with the Food Safety and Standards Act, 2006.
